snippet: The Financial Times is celebrating its 125th birthday on Wednesday. While the print editions are fading, the news organization has figured out how to make money from new outlets.
abstract: Financial Times, which will soon celebrate its 125th birthday, has created several lucrative digital revenue streams as its historic print edition fades from prominence; paper was one of first to charge customers for access to its Web site.
lead_paragraph: The Financial Times is celebrating its 125th birthday on Wednesday. While the print editions are fading, the news organization has figured out how to make money from new outlets.

headline.main: With a Focus on Its Future, Financial Times Turns 125
headline.print_headline: With a Focus on Its Future, Financial Times Turns 125
